---
title: "Diamonds Plot"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

# Get current date and time
timestamp <- format(Sys.time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")

# Plot with timestamp in the title
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price, color = cut)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  labs(title = "Diamonds: Price vs Carat by Cut",
        subtitle =  paste0("Created on ",timestamp))
```
